Our Products

Zukos Brewery - Polish Heritage in Every Sip!

Zukos Pale Lager

Light, crisp flavor.

  • Alc: 5,2%
  • IBU: 10
  • EBC: 8

Our classic Lager has a mild flavor profile with a balance of slight malt sweetness and low hop bitterness, making it a refreshing and easy-to-drink option.

Zukos India Pale Ale

Highly hopped, citrusy flavor.

  • Alc: 4,6%
  • IBU: 30
  • EBC: 10

India Pale Ale is characterized by its strong hop aroma and flavor, often featuring citrus, pine, and floral notes. This bold and flavorful beer is popular among craft beer enthusiasts.

Zukos White Lager

Light and fruity flavor.

  • Alc: 5%
  • IBU: 28
  • EBC: 8

A white lager is a light, refreshing beer that combines the crispness of a traditional lager with the subtle, fruity, and spicy notes of a wheat beer. This beer style is perfect for those seeking a light, easy-drinking option.

Zukos Imperial Stout

Thick texture, rich flavor.

  • Alc: 11%
  • IBU: 95
  • EBC: 550

An Imperial Stout is a robust and richly flavored beer known for its high alcohol content and deep, dark color. This beer style is prized for its complexity and depth.

Zukos Baltic Porter

Smooth and rich flavor.

  • Alc: 7,8
  • IBU: 36
  • EBC: 95

A Baltic Porter is a strong and smooth dark beer that combines elements of both porters and stouts. It is known for its full body, complex flavor profile, and balanced sweetness.
